Texts.Eng: Reach the end of the ^orange;Vanguard testing facility^reset;
Talk to ^orange;Rokhan^reset; to enter the ^orange;testing facility^reset;

The Vanguard is deploying its vehicles across more and more locations every day, and we need to test them to ensure they continue to operate effectively. I need you to ^green;enter our testing facility and put the ^orange;Vanguard Krahl ^green;to the test^reset;. In return, I'll allow ^orange;Jakhar ^reset;to sell you Vanguard vehicles.

Well done, your run through the testing facility has provided the Vanguard with a lot of information to study. Jakhar has been informed that he can now sell you Vanguard vehicles: make sure to pay him a visit.
